Title: Software Engineer I
Description: Entry-level engineer responsible for implementing small features, writing unit tests, and fixing bugs under supervision.

Title: Software Engineer II
Description: Mid-level engineer who designs and develops moderate features, participates in code reviews, and collaborates with cross-functional teams.

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description: Experienced engineer responsible for system design, mentoring juniors, ensuring code quality, and driving technical initiatives.

Title: Lead Software Engineer
Description: Technical leader overseeing multiple modules or teams, guiding architecture decisions, and ensuring alignment with business goals.

Title: Principal Engineer
Description: Domain expert providing technical direction across projects, defining coding standards, and influencing strategic technology decisions.

Title: Software Architect
Description: Responsible for end-to-end architecture, scalability, and technology roadmap. Ensures the system aligns with organizational and product vision.

Title: Engineering Manager
Description: Leads engineering teams, balances technical direction and people management, and collaborates with stakeholders for project delivery.

Title: Director of Engineering
Description: Oversees multiple teams or departments, defines engineering vision, manages budgets, and aligns technology initiatives with company goals.
